column4: umm...what the hell.... everytime i use sudo I get this: sudo: /var/run/sudo owned by uid 1000, should be uid 0
ummm could someone point me in the right dir of this error? sudo: /var/run/sudo owned by uid 1000, should be uid 0
any ideas?  cant use sudo at all..
boot to rescue mode, then chown root /var/run/sudo
